languages.text: {n}Кощунственное изучение Знания ксеносов, предпринятое в рамках дознания, привело к серии еретических актов творения — утратившие стойкость магосы стремились применить секреты эльдаров в своих изысканиях. Провинившиеся были сервиторизированы, а результаты их трудов помещены в охраняемый запретный каталог.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кощунственное изучение Знания ксеносов, предпринятое в рамках дознания, привело к серии еретических актов творения — утратившие стойкость магосы стремились применить секреты эльдаров в своих изысканиях. Провинившиеся были сервиторизированы, а результаты их трудов помещены в охраняемый запретный каталог.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The blasphemous research of the xenos' Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the magos have sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous research of the xenos' Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the magos have sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}此次研究的过程中包含了对异形知识的亵渎性研究，而这样的研究最终导致了一系列异端创造行为。那些受到诱惑的贤者打算将艾达灵族的秘密应用到他们的研究中。这些异端分子被改造成了机仆，而他们的研究成果则被存在了受保护的禁忌目录之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}此次研究的过程中包含了对异形知识的亵渎性研究，而这样的研究最终导致了一系列异端创造行为。那些受到诱惑的贤者打算将艾达灵族的秘密应用到他们的研究中。这些异端分子被改造成了奴工，而他们的研究成果则被存在了受保护的禁忌目录之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La investigación blasfema del conocimiento xenos, emprendida como parte del interrogatorio, ha conducido a una serie de actos heréticos de creación. Las mentes debilitadas de los Magos intentaron aplicar los secretos de los Aeldari a su investigación. Los culpables fueron servidorizados y los resultados de su trabajo colocados en un directorio protegido y prohibido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La investigación blasfema del conocimiento xenos, emprendida como parte del interrogatorio, ha conducido a una serie de actos heréticos de creación. Las mentes debilitadas de los Magos intentaron aplicar los secretos de los Aeldari a su investigación. Los culpables fueron servidorizados y los resultados de su trabajo colocados en un directorio protegido y prohibido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尋問の一環として行われたゼノの知識についての冒涜的な研究は、異端的な創造行為につながった...マゴスの心が弱体化したため、アエルダリの秘密を自分たちの研究に応用しようとしたのだ。犯人たちは従者とされ、その作業の結果は保護された禁断のディレクトリに保管された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尋問の一環として行われたゼノの知識についての冒涜的な研究は、異端的な創造行為につながった...マゴスの心が弱体化したため、アエルダリの秘密を自分たちの研究に応用しようとしたのだ。犯人たちは従者とされ、その作業の結果は保護された禁断のディレクトリに保管された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les recherches blasphématoires portant sur les connaissances xénos, entreprises dans le cadre de l'interrogatoire, mènent à une série de créations hérétiques, car les esprits affaiblis des magos cherchent à appliquer les secrets des Aeldaris à leurs recherches. Les coupables voient grossir les rangs des servitors, et le fruit de leur travail est remisé dans un répertoire protégé et interdit d'accès.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les recherches blasphématoires portant sur les connaissances xénos, entreprises dans le cadre de l'interrogatoire, mènent à une série de créations hérétiques, car les esprits affaiblis des magos cherchent à appliquer les secrets des Aeldaris à leurs recherches. Les coupables voient grossir les rangs des servitors, et le fruit de leur travail est remisé dans un répertoire protégé et interdit d'accès.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die blasphemische Erforschung von Xenos-Wissen, die als Teil des Verhörs erfolgt ist, hat zu einer Reihe ketzerischer Schöpfungsakte geführt. Der geschwächte Verstand der Magi wollte die Geheimnisse der Aeldari auf ihre eigene Forschung anwenden. Die Sünder wurden servitorisiert und die Ergebnisse ihrer Arbeit in einem geschützten, verbotenen Verzeichnis gelagert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die blasphemische Erforschung von Xenos-Wissen, die als Teil des Verhörs erfolgt ist, hat zu einer Reihe ketzerischer Schöpfungsakte geführt. Der geschwächte Verstand der Magi wollte die Geheimnisse der Aeldari auf ihre eigene Forschung anwenden. Die Sünder wurden servitorisiert und die Ergebnisse ihrer Arbeit in einem geschützten, verbotenen Verzeichnis gelagert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soruşturmanın bir parçası olarak günah işleme pahasına yürütülen zeno irfanı araştırmaları, birtakım kâfirce icadın keşfine yol açtı. Magos'un zayıf düşen hizmetkârları, Aeldari sırlarını araştırmalarında kullanmaya kalkıştı. İşin ardındakiler hizmetörleştirildi ve araştırma sonuçları, muhafaza edilmek üzere yasaklı bir bölmeye yerleştirildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}
